column2: whenever someone i follow replies to user cadieckmann on twitter play URL_0 on my lg tv
column3: monitor ( ( @com.twitter.home_timeline ) filter param:in_reply_to:Entity(tt:username) == " cadieckmann " ^^tt:username ) => @com.lg.tv.webos2.play_url param:url:Entity(tt:url) = URL_0

column2: update my tumblr with some cat uploads .
send an email to EMAIL_ADDRESS_0 using the subject power indices and order the dropbox files in alphabetical order
column3: monitor ( @com.dropbox.list_folder param:order_by:Enum(modified_time_decreasing,modified_time_increasing,name_decreasing,name_increasing) = enum:name_increasing ) => @com.gmail.send_email param:subject:String = " power indices " param:to:Entity(tt:email_address) = EMAIL_ADDRESS_0 on param:message:String = event

column2: turn on the lights when i get a tweet .
if my fitbit weight makes a change then dial ajita
column3: monitor ( @com.fitbit.getbody ) on new param:weight:Measure(kg) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.call param:number:Entity(tt:phone_number) = " ajita " ^^tt:username

column2: tell me articles in the washington post in the lifestyle section when i tweet
if the security camera shows something notify me by flashing lights
get opinions on the articles in the washington post when dorman products inc. 's stock price changes .
column3: ( monitor ( @com.yahoo.finance.get_stock_quote param:stock_id:Entity(tt:stock_id) = " dorman products inc. " ^^tt:stock_id ) ) => ( @com.washingtonpost.get_article param:section:Enum(politics,opinions,local,sports,national,world,business,lifestyle) = enum:opinions ) => notify

column2: play URL_0 on my lg tv if a person is detected by the security camera
column3: monitor ( ( @security-camera.current_event ) filter param:has_person:Boolean == true ) => @com.lg.tv.webos2.play_url param:url:Entity(tt:url) = URL_0

column2: turn off the hvac when there is a new article in the local section of the washington post
